name: Dark MonoChrome WWT
description:
A complete dark monochromatic theme for WWT.
This is a complete theme.

NEW In This Theme:
1. Commented Sections in CSS for help in modification
2. Completely monochromatic
3. Can (possibly) work sectionally
additional_info:
Changelog: v1.0 :
  1. Initial Release
v1.1 :
  1. All Sections Completed
v1.2:
  1. Fixed Chrome Outline
  2. Made changes to text inputs
v1.3:
  1. Fixed Navbar Padding Issues
  2. Removed Text Input Styles
v1.4:
  1. Added support for my "Watchlist" script.
v1.5:
  1. Added style for "Online Users" count on the navbar.
